trans-unit.source: Configuring approval workflows with Signavio Workflow Accelerator (optional)

seg-source.mrk: Configuring approval workflows with Signavio Workflow Accelerator (optional)

target.mrk: Freigabe-Workflow mit Signavio Workflow Accelerator konfigurieren (optional)

trans-unit.source: Signavio provides Signavio Workflow Accelerator to customers who purchased a corresponding subscription. If your organization wants to use the approval workflows feature, you need to install Signavio Workflow Accelerator on your server.

seg-source.mrk: Signavio provides Signavio Workflow Accelerator to customers who purchased a corresponding subscription.
If your organization wants to use the approval workflows feature, you need to install Signavio Workflow Accelerator on your server.

target.mrk: Signavio bietet Signavio Workflow Accelerator den Kunden, die eine entsprechende Lizenz erworben haben.
Wenn Ihre Organisation die Freigabe-Workflow-Funktion verwenden möchte, müssen Sie Signavio Workflow Accelerator auf Ihrem Server installieren.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <MadCap:xref href="../../../workflow-accelerator/adminguide/intro/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Signavio Workflow Accelerator administrators guide</MadCap:xref> for more information about the system requirements and the installation process.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to the <MadCap:xref href="../../../workflow-accelerator/adminguide/intro/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Signavio Workflow Accelerator administrators guide</MadCap:xref> for more information about the system requirements and the installation process.

target.mrk: Weitere Informationen zu den Systemanforderungen und zum Installationsvorgang finden Sie im Abschnitt <MadCap:xref href="../../../workflow-accelerator/adminguide/intro/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Signavio Workflow Accelerator administrators guide</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Before installing Signavio Workflow Accelerator, please ensure your Signavio version is compatible with the Signavio Workflow Accelerator version you plan to install. You find a corresponding compatibility list <MadCap:xref href="../../../workflow-accelerator/adminguide/process-manager-integration/compatibility-list.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">here</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Before installing Signavio Workflow Accelerator, please ensure your Signavio version is compatible with the Signavio Workflow Accelerator version you plan to install.

You find a corresponding compatibility list <MadCap:xref href="../../../workflow-accelerator/adminguide/process-manager-integration/compatibility-list.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">here</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie vor der Installation sicher, dass Ihre Process Manager-Version mit der Signavio Workflow Accelerator-Version, die Sie installieren, kompatibel ist.
